node.content-desc: Financisto - Personal Finance Tracker for Android
[+] Release new features and bug-fixes from the open-source contributors.
[*] Few more bugs to iron out, please bear with us.
[+] SMS parsing with templates by Mikhail Baturov
[+] Free currency provider to replace Flowrz as default by Vitaly Teremasov
[+] Attach a picture from camera or gallery
[+] Add search by note to blotter filter by Tiberius Teng
[+] Add optional menu button to Accounts list for convenience (disable in Preferences)
[*] Minor bug fixes and UI improvements
[!] No more software menu button. Unfortunately, it is not possible to support without degrading other functionality. All actions are available directly from UI.
[*] Migrate Dropbox API from deprecated v1 to v2. Please re-authorize to enable backups to Dropbox in the Preferences.
[*] Partially restore locations - no geo-location support though, I won't be able to do that easily now
[+] Add a new tab with all menu options for the devices without hardware menu button
[+] Add an option to automatically upload backups to Google Drive
[-] Removed support for locations, removed appropriate permissions as well
Apologizes for the lack of updates lately. I'm investing all my available time to work on proper Holo re-design. Please take a look at these early
[*] Stop asking for Google account password in the preferences, use proper authorization for Google Drive backup
[*] Provide offline rate if network is not available
[-] Fix filter by category in Blotter
[*] Add filters to pick no category, no payee, no project, current location transactions in blotter
[*] Add an option to disable haptic feedback on PIN screen
[+] Add more exchange rate providers (OpenExchangeRates, Flowzr)
[+] Download all current rates at once (Menu in Exchange rates screen)
[*] Add original amount/currency into CSV export/import
[*] New and updated translations from Crowdin
[+] Enter regular/split transactions with any currency different from the account's currency
[*] Add two new periods to Blotter filter
[*] Add an option to pick startup screen
[*] UI tweaks, like remembering position in the Blotter when using quick menu, add 'Reconcile' action
[+] Semi-automatic integrity check to address the issues with running balance going out of sync Menu -> More -> Integrity fix
[+] Archiving: Delete old transactions without affecting account balance
[+] Option to hide closed accounts on the accounts list screen
[+] Option to show last transaction date on the accounts list screen
[*] Split screen improvements: create categories on the fly, specify category attributes, select projects
[*] Projects imported as classes in QIF
[-] Option to manually re-index categories if the category report seems broken (Menu->Entities->Categories->Menu->Re-index)
[-] Fix bug with creating new categories
[*] Improve CSV Import to create categories and projects automatically
[-] Fix default sign for amount input to be expense
[+] Add an option to disable projects
[+] Add more filter options to reports (experimental)
[*] Remember filters for each report individually
[*] Keep only one By Category report to resolve any ambiguity
[*] Fix pie charts in By Category reports
[*] Add an option to collapse or show all buttons on the Blotter screen
[+] Send .csv and .qif export files to Dropbox
[+] Pie charts in the Reports (experimental, constructive criticisms is most welcome)
[-] Fix the bug in totals and reports with huge amounts
[+] New 3x1 and 4x1 widgets with embedded "New transaction" and "New transfer" buttons
[-] Fix the with new category selector asking for pin
[-] Fix parsing rate for comma delimiter
[*] English is available in the list of locales
[-] Fixed bug with Split category available when selecting category parent
[+] Integration with Dropbox to send backup/auto-backup files to the cloud
[+] Add a preference to enable/disable quick menus in Accounts and Blotter (enabled by default)
[+] Add 'New transaction' and 'New transfer' to the account quick menu
[+] Backup folder is now configurable in the preferences
[+] Send backup file to Dropbox/Docs/Email using the standard intent
[*] Database backup is now gzipped by default
[-] Restore the option to auto-select the last category for account if Payee is not used
[-] Fix for incorrect Report by Period with split transfers
[+] QIF Import (full import only for now, experimental)
[-] Fixed bug with selecting a payee with or without first letter capitalized
[-] Fixed force-close bug with editing old transactions
[-] Bug fixes for monthly preview and category reports
[*] Month Preview and CC Statement show scheduled and planned transactions correctly
[-] Fixed bug with not possible to delete a split
[+] Option not to ask for PIN for 'New transaction' and 'New transfer' screens
[+] Option to lock application after specified amount of time (experimental)
[*] Improve QIF export - options to select amount and date formats
[*] Improved launcher icons for new transaction and new transfer
[-] Fix bugs with limit amount for credit card accounts
[-] Fixed bug with reports by category crashes
[+] Configurable closing day for cc accounts
[+] An option to move app to SD (not recommended, do it on your own risk)
[*] Redesign of amount input field to include income/expense component
[*] Restoring category field before amount in new transaction screen
[*] Add vibrate feedback for calculator and PIN dialogs
[+] Danish translation by Allan Grauengaard Hedelain
[+] Edit transaction from template on empty amount or tap-and-hold
[*] Auto-select amount when editing transactions for quick replacement
[*] Auto-restore missed scheduled transactions while phone is off and on database restore (you can switch it off in the preferences)
[+] 2D graph reports by Abdsandryk Souza and Rodrigo Sousa
[*] Russian localization improved by Andrew K. Lovetski
[*] QVGA devices support in the Market
[*] Italian translation improved by Carlo Brualdi
[*] CSV export improved to include full parent category path (thanks, tlnd!)
[+] Portuguese Brazil by Charles Henrique and Leonardo Bassin
[+] Backup and restore to/from Google Docs
[+] Monthly preview and statements for Credit Cards
[+] Allow to open accounts with negative balance
[+] An option to include transfers into reports
[-] Fixed bug with project select in blotter filter
[-] Fixed bug with monthly recurring transactions
[+] Attach a picture to the transaction
[*] Add project to CSV export, separate data/time columns
[-] Fix a bug with widget updates
[+] Add an option to disable widget
[+] Add 'last week' and 'last month' to report by period
[*] Tap on the widget to open Financisto
[-] Fix UTF-8 issues with CSV export
[-] Fix a bug with account balance getting out of sync
[-] Fixed bug with account list layout in 1.5
[+] Widget (2x1) - tap on icon to cycle accounts
[*] Budgets based on multiple categories and projects
[+] Sort blotter by date asc/desc using filter
[+] New option Preferences->New transaction screen->Use fixed layout
[*] Allow more than 10 digits for amounts
[-] Fixed bug with accounts changing type after database restore
[-] Fixed bug with restoring blotter filter
[-] Fixed bug with total amount not updating on account list screen
[-] Fixed account list layout for very long credit card names
[*] Date and time formats according to system settings
[-] Temporary fix for Location screen crashes
[+] CSV export. Please note that the format is a subject to change
[-] Fixed bugs with note in transfer
[*] 'New Transaction' and 'New Transfer' shortcuts will not be created by default. They can be added to the Home screen manually
[*] More native way to inform a user about the input errors
[-] Correctly show 'checkbox' attribute value in the transaction info dialog
[+] Remember the last selected items for a transaction: the last account, the last category for the selected account, the last location/project for the selected category
[+] Show/hide location, note and project on the transaction/transfer screen
[*] Improve frequency counter for a location
[+] An option to sort locations by frequency
[-] Fixed the bug with category select in blotter filter
[+] An option to disable 'My Location' marker in the Location dialog
[+] An option for an account to not be included in totals
[*] PIN dialog re-designed to work properly in landscape and QVGA
[-] Fixed bug when edit a transaction which belongs to a closed account
[-] Deletion of project/location is now properly handled
[-] Fixed bug that newly created account is closed by default
[*] Duplicate transaction with current date/time without showing the new transaction dialog
[-] Fixed error when opening transfer from account
[+] Ability to force-get GPS location for transaction
[-] Fixed bug with multiple categories with the same name
